<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent">
    <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <always_available>true</always_available>
        <category/>
        <fallback>false</fallback>
        <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session>
        <keyword>WhatsHappening</keyword>
        <name>What's happening today?</name>
        <next_intent>65b172cadb5db200d1a9f1351d9619b3,778172cadb5db200d1a9f1351d9619b9,54cdae0adb5db200d1a9f1351d9619d1</next_intent>
        <order>100</order>
        <output_speech_format/>
        <reprompt_speech_format/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(content, attributes, erb, current){
		
	var introMessage = "Here's what's happening today: ";
	var outroMessage = ' ';
	var msg = '';
	
	//Service Interruptions
	var gaO = new GlideAggregate('cmdb_ci_outage');
	gaO.addAggregate('COUNT');
	gaO.addEncodedQuery('begin<javascript:gs.daysAgoStart(0)^endISEMPTY^typeINdegradation,outage');
	gaO.query();
	
	var outages = 0;
	if (gaO.next())
		outages = gaO.getAggregate('COUNT');
	
	if (outages > 0) {
		introMessage += "There " + (outages > 1 ? "are " : "is ") + outages +
		(outages > 1 ? " Outages or Service Interruptions " : " Outage or Service Interruption ") +
		" impacting services today. ";
		outroMessage += "To hear the outage details, say 'Hear Outages. '";
	}
	
	//P1 incidents
	var gaI = new GlideAggregate('incident');
	gaI.addAggregate('COUNT');
	gaI.addEncodedQuery('active=true^priority=1');
	gaI.query();
	var incidents = 0;
	if (gaI.next())
		incidents = gaI.getAggregate('COUNT');
	
	if (incidents > 0) {
		introMessage += "There " + (incidents > 1 ? "are " : "is ") + incidents +
		(incidents > 1 ? " active Priority One incidents." : " active Priority One incident.");
		outroMessage += "To hear the Priority one incident details, say 'Hear Incidents. '";
	}
	
	
	//Changes
	var gaC = new GlideAggregate('change_request');
	gaC.addAggregate('COUNT');
	gaC.addEncodedQuery('start_dateONToday@javascript:gs.daysAgoStart(0)@javascript:gs.daysAgoEnd(0)^active=true');
	gaC.query();
	var changes = 0;
	if (gaC.next())
		changes = gaC.getAggregate('COUNT');

	if (changes > 0) {
		introMessage += "There " + (changes > 1 ? "are " : "is ") + changes +
		(changes > 1 ? " changes " : " change ") +
		'scheduled for implementation today';	
		outroMessage += "To hear the Change details, say 'Hear Changes. '";
	}
	
	if (incidents == 0 && outages == 0 && changes == 0){
		introMessage += 'It looks like there are no interruptions, Priority one incidents or changes scheduled today. Relax and take a load off.';
	}
	
	msg = "<speak>" + introMessage + outroMessage + "</speak>";

	erb.setOutputSpeech("SSML", "", msg);
	erb.setReprompt("SSML", "", "<speak>" + outroMessage + "</speak>");
	erb.setEnd(false);
	
	result = erb.getResponse();
	
})(content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder(), current);]]></script>
